standard.name: Builtin
standard.tips: Provides a set of often needed generic keywords. Always automatically available without imports.

standard.name: OperatingSystem
standard.tips: Enables various operating system related tasks to be performed in the system where Robot Framework is running.

standard.name: String
standard.tips: Library for generating, modifying and verifying strings.

standard.name: Process
standard.tips: Library for running processes in the system. New in Robot Framework 2.8.

standard.name: Dialogs
standard.tips: Provides means for pausing the execution and getting input from users.

standard.name: Remote
standard.tips: Special library acting as a proxy between Robot Framework and libraries elsewhere. Actual libraries can be running on different machines and be implemented using any programming language supporting XML-RPC protocol.

standard.name: Telnet
standard.tips: Makes it possible to connect to Telnet servers and execute commands on the opened connections.

standard.name: DateTime
standard.tips: Library for date and time conversions. New in Robot Framework 2.8.5.

standard.name: Collections
standard.tips: Provides a set of keywords for handling Python lists and dictionaries.

standard.name: Screenshot
standard.tips: Provides keywords to capture screenshots of the desktop.

standard.name: XML
standard.tips: Library for generating, modifying and verifying XML files.

external.name: AppiumLibrary
external.tips: Library for Android and iOS testing. It uses Appium internally.

external.name: AutoRecorder
external.tips: Library which allows to automatically record video for test/suites execution.

external.name: ConfluentKafkaLibrary
external.tips: Library for python confluent kafka.

external.name: Database Library (Python)
external.tips: Python based library for database testing. Works with any Python interpreter, including Jython.

external.name: Diff Library
external.tips: Library to diff two files together.

external.name: Eclipse Library
external.tips: Library for testing Eclipse RCP applications using SWT widgets.

external.name: HTTP RequestsLibrary (Python)
external.tips: Library for HTTP level testing using Python Requests internally.

external.name: JavaFXLibrary
external.tips: Library for testing JavaFX applications, based on TestFX. Has also remote interface support.

external.name: Mainframe3270 Library
external.tips: Library that allows to create automated test scripts to test IBM Mainframe 3270.

external.name: Rammbock
external.tips: Generic network protocol test library that offers easy way to specify network packets and inspect the results of sent and received packets.

external.name: RPA framework
external.tips: Collection of open-source libraries and tools for Robotic Process Automation (RPA), designed to be used both with Robot Framework and Python.

external.name: SeleniumScreenshots
external.tips: Library for annotating and cropping screenshots taken with SeleniumLibrary.

external.name: SikuliLibrary
external.tips: Sikuli Robot Framework Library provide keywords to test UI through Sikulix. This library supports Python 2.x and 3.x.

external.name: SwingLibrary
external.tips: Library for testing Java applications with Swing GUI.

external.name: WhiteLibrary
external.tips: Library for automating Windows GUI. Based on White framework, supported technologies include Win32, WinForms, and WPF.

external.name: ArchiveLibrary
external.tips: Library for handling zip- and tar-archives.

external.name: Browser Library
external.tips: Robot Framework Browser library is a modern web testing library.

external.name: CURFLibrary
external.tips: Library for testing CAN bus with support for ISO-TP and UDS.

external.name: DataDriver Library
external.tips: Library for Data-Driven Testing with external data tables (csv, xls, xlsx, etc.). Pairwise Combinatorial Testing support.

external.name: Django Library
external.tips: Library for Django, a Python web framework.

external.name: robotframework-faker
external.tips: Library for Faker, a fake test data generator.

external.name: HttpRequestLibrary (Java)
external.tips: Library for HTTP level testing using Apache HTTP client. Available also at Maven central.

external.name: KiCadLibrary
external.tips: Library for interacting with KiCad EDA designs.

external.name: MQTT library
external.tips: Library for testing MQTT brokers and applications.

external.name: RemoteSwingLibrary
external.tips: Library for testing and connecting to a java process and using SwingLibrary, especially Java Web Start applications.

external.name: SapGuiLibrary
external.tips: Library for testing the SAPGUI client using the internal SAP Scripting Engine

external.name: SeleniumLibrary
external.tips: Web testing library that uses popular Selenium tool internally.

external.name: SoapLibrary
external.tips: This library is designed for those who want to work with webservice automation as if they were using SoapUI, make a request through an XML file, and receive the response in another XML file.

external.name: TestFX Library
external.tips: Library to enable to test Java FX applications using the TestFX framework. Has also remote interface support. Maintained Fork...

external.name: WADLibrary
external.tips: Application testing library for Robot Framework that utilizes Win App Driver.

external.name: AutoItLibrary
external.tips: Windows GUI testing library that uses AutoIt freeware tool as a driver.

external.name: CncLibrary
external.tips: Library for driving a CNC milling machine.

external.name: Database Library (Java)
external.tips: Java-based library for database testing. Usable with Jython. Available also at Maven central.

external.name: Debug Library
external.tips: A debug library for RobotFramework, which can be used as an interactive shell(REPL) also.

external.name: DoesIsLibrary
external.tips: Library with autogenerated keywords like Is Something, Does Someting created form assertion keywords like Should Be, Should Not Be, etc

external.name: FTP library
external.tips: Library for testing and using FTP server with Robot Framework.

external.name: ImageHorizonLibrary
external.tips: Cross-platform, pure Python library for GUI automation based on image recognition.

external.name: ListenerLibrary
external.tips: Library allows to register keywords to run before/after other keywords and suites.

external.name: PuppeteerLibrary
external.tips: Library for web testing using Puppeteer tool internally.

external.name: RESTinstance
external.tips: Robot Framework test library for HTTP JSON APIs.

external.name: ScreenCapLibrary
external.tips: Library for taking screenshots and video recording. Similar functionality as Screenshot standard library, with some additional features.

external.name: SeleniumLibrary for Java
external.tips: Java port of the SeleniumLibrary.

external.name: SSHLibrary
external.tips: Enables executing commands on remote machines over an SSH connection. Also supports transfering files using SFTP.

external.name: TFTPLibrary
external.tips: Library for interacting over Trivial File Transfer Portocol.

external.name: Zoomba Library
external.tips: Library extending features in many popular tools for GUI, Rest API, Soap API, Mobile, and Windows (WinAppDriver) automation. An ideal all-in-one toolkit for new or existing Robot Framework projects.

other.name: Creating test libraries
other.tips: Creating test libraries section in Robot Framework User Guide.

other.name: Remote
other.tips: Built-in special library acting as a proxy between Robot Framework and test libraries elsewhere. Actual test libraries can be running on different machines and be implemented using any programming language supporting XML-RPC protocol.

other.name: plone.app.robotframework
other.tips: Provides resources and tools for writing functional Selenium tests for Plone CMS and its add-ons.

other.name: RemoteApplications
other.tips: Special test library for launching Java applications on a separate JVM and taking other libraries into use on them.

other.name: JavalibCore
other.tips: Base for implementing larger Java based test libraries for Robot Framework.
